title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings
author: oeyoews
name: tiddlywiki-settings
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/readme","text":"> WIP

!! TODO

* 加上一些 tiddlywiki 的隐藏配置
* 支持中英文切换配置界面: 参考 codemirror6 的配置界面
* 搜索框: 可搜索
* 为了方便, 使用 js, 而不适用 tid
* 借鉴一些 commandpalette 的写法.
* 支持一键初始化

!! Motivation

"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/settings.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/settings.js","text":"/*\

\*/
module.exports={title:{type:"input",text:"",caption:{zh:"太微标题",en:"Tiddlywiki title"},description:{zh:"",en:""}},subtitle:{},defaultTiddlers:{},defaultNewTiddlerTitle:{},defaultNewJournalTitleFormat:{},newTiddlerTags:{},defaultNewTiddlersFocus:{},username:{},description:{type:"input",text:"",caption:{zh:"网站描述",en:"Website description"}},animation:{type:"number",text:"200"},storyList:{},palette:{},theme:{},storyview:{},layout:{},stickyTitles:{type:"boolean",text:"no"},storyWidth:{},sidebarWidth:{},fontSize:{},fontFamily:{},camelcase:{},defaultSidebarTab:{},permalink:{},navigation:{},minSearchLength:{},editorRefreshTime:{type:"number",text:1e3}};","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"library"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/widget.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/widget.js","text":"/*\

const{widget:e}=require("$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js");exports["widget-3DU11czCzY"]=class extends e{constructor(e,t){super(e,t)}render(e,t){if(!$tw.browser)return;this.computeAttributes(),this.execute();const s=$tw.utils.domMaker,r=(require("./setting"),s("button",{text:"Click me",class:"rounded p-1"})),i=s("div",{children:[r]});e.insertBefore(i,t),this.domNodes.push(i)}};","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"widget"}}}
